mapper.select: SELECT e.*, emp.empEmail,emp.empName, CASE e.refType WHEN 'registration' THEN r.regNote WHEN 'vacation' THEN v.vacContent WHEN 'etc' THEN t.etcMemo ELSE e.memo END AS refDetail, CASE e.refType WHEN 'registration' THEN r.regTime WHEN 'vacation' THEN v.vacStartedAt WHEN 'etc' THEN t.startTime END AS refStartTime, CASE e.refType WHEN 'registration' THEN r.lastTime WHEN 'vacation' THEN v.vacEndedAt WHEN 'etc' THEN t.endTime END AS refEndTime FROM EmpSchedule e JOIN Employee emp ON e.empNum = emp.empNum LEFT JOIN Registration r ON e.refType = 'registration' AND e.refId = r.regNum LEFT JOIN Vacation v ON e.refType = 'vacation' AND e.refId = v.vacNum LEFT JOIN Etc t ON e.refType = 'etc' AND e.refId = t.etcNum ORDER BY e.startTime, e.endTime
